ygData.subject: Re: Biographies
ygData.msgSnippet: Well Treilanin s bio has changed since I first wrote it, but my current bio basically follows this.  During the Crushbone Orc s first foray into the forest of
ygData.messageBody:
Well Treilanin's bio has changed since I first wrote it, but my current
bio basically follows this. During the Crushbone Orc's first foray into
the forest of Greater Faydar Trei's love Aariel was kidnapped from him.
So, he was left to search for her (she was not a slave in CB) all across
Antonica. With seething hatred Trei exact his bitter revenge upon all
orcs that cross his path as he searches for Aariel.

Now many things have changed since then that have changed what Trei is
doing, but I have yet to get around to updating the bio so it reflects his
current state. Besides there isn't enough room to write out everything
there.

BTW how many actually read the bios when they inspect people? I
personally read the bios when I inspect unless the person really wants me
to drool over an item they are wearing.

Treilanin Bard of Kelethin
Aariel Mage of Felwithe
Karana Server
